sqlMap.select:
SELECT project.PROJECT_ID, project.PROJECT_NO, bizorder.WORK_ADDRESS, bizorder.lng, bizorder.lat, project.PROJECT_NAME , bizorder.ORDER_ID, bizorder.ORDER_NO, morder.MORDER_ID, morder.MORDER_NO, cus.CUS_NAME , user.USER_FULLNAME PM_NAME, muser.USER_FULLNAME MAINTTAN_NAME, morder.MAINTAIN_STATUS, morder.fault_Desc FROM qr_morder morder JOIN qr_order bizorder ON morder.ORDER_ID = bizorder.order_id and bizorder.order_status=0 JOIN qr_project project ON bizorder.PROJECT_ID = project.PROJECT_ID and project.pro_status=0 LEFT JOIN qr_custom cus ON project.CUS_ID = cus.CUS_ID LEFT JOIN qr_user user ON user.USER_ID = project.PM_ID LEFT JOIN qr_user muser ON muser.USER_ID = morder.MAINTAIN_PM
WHERE MORDER_STATUS=0
AND ( #insUser# = morder.MAINTAIN_PM OR #insUser# = morder.MORDER_PM OR #insUser# = project.PM_ID OR EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM qr_rel_project_user qrpu WHERE qrpu.project_id = project.PROJECT_ID AND qrpu.user_id = #insUser# ) )
morder.MAINTAIN_STATUS=0
morder.MAINTAIN_STATUS=3
(MAINTAIN_STATUS=1 OR MAINTAIN_STATUS=2)
(morder.MORDER_NO LIKE '%$strLike$%' or project.PROJECT_NO LIKE '%$strLike$%' or user.USER_FULLNAME LIKE '%$strLike$%' )
morder.MORDER_NO LIKE '%$morderNo$%'
morder.ORDER_ID =#orderId#
bizorder.ORDER_NO LIKE '%$orderNo$%'
EXISTS ( SELECT item.deviceitem_uid FROM qr_deviceitem item WHERE item.order_id = bizorder.ORDER_ID AND item.deviceitem_uid LIKE '%$convergeBoxNo$%' )
order by morder.MORDER_ID Desc
#startPageNum# ,#pageSize#

SELECT count(1) FROM qr_morder morder JOIN qr_order bizorder ON morder.ORDER_ID = bizorder.order_id and bizorder.order_status=0 JOIN qr_project project ON bizorder.PROJECT_ID = project.PROJECT_ID and project.pro_status=0 LEFT JOIN qr_custom cus ON project.CUS_ID = cus.CUS_ID LEFT JOIN qr_user user ON user.USER_ID = project.PM_ID LEFT JOIN qr_user muser ON muser.USER_ID = morder.MAINTAIN_PM
WHERE MORDER_STATUS=0
AND ( #insUser# = morder.MAINTAIN_PM OR #insUser# = morder.MORDER_PM OR #insUser# = project.PM_ID OR EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM qr_rel_project_user qrpu WHERE qrpu.project_id = project.PROJECT_ID AND qrpu.user_id = #insUser# ) )
morder.MAINTAIN_STATUS=0
morder.MAINTAIN_STATUS=3
(MAINTAIN_STATUS=1 OR MAINTAIN_STATUS=2)
(morder.MORDER_NO LIKE '%$strLike$%' or project.PROJECT_NO LIKE '%$strLike$%' or user.USER_FULLNAME LIKE '%$strLike$%' )
morder.MORDER_NO LIKE '%$morderNo$%'
morder.ORDER_ID =#orderId#
bizorder.ORDER_NO LIKE '%$orderNo$%'
EXISTS ( SELECT item.deviceitem_uid FROM qr_deviceitem item WHERE item.order_id = bizorder.ORDER_ID AND item.deviceitem_uid LIKE '%$convergeBoxNo$%' )

SELECT pro.PROJECT_NO, pro.PROJECT_NAME, ord.ORDER_NO, mord.MORDER_ID, mord.MORDER_NO, mord.MORDER_PM, pmuser.USER_FULLNAME MORDER_PM_name, DATE_FORMAT(mord.MAINTAIN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') MAINTAIN_DATE, mord.FAULT_DESC, DATE_FORMAT(mord.APPOINTMENT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') APPOINTMENT_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(mord.PLAN_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') PLAN_END_DATE, mord.MWORKER_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(mord.MAINTAIN_BEGIN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') MAINTAIN_BEGIN_DATE, mord.MAINTAIN_STATUS, ms.text maintain_status_desc, mord.MAINTAIN_SPEED, mord.FAULT_TYPE, ft.FAULTTYPE_NAME fault_type_desc, mord.MAINTAIN_PM, pmuser.USER_FULLNAME MAINTAIN_PM_NAME, mord.ACCEPT_STATUS, astust.text ACCEPT_STATUS_DESC, mord.ACCEPTECALL_MAN, mord.CALLBACK_DATE, mord.SOLUTION, mord.MAINTAIN_RESULTDESC, mord.MAINTAIN_REMARK, mord.USER_SCORE, mord.USER_PROPOSAL, DATE_FORMAT(mord.LAST_UPDDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') LAST_UPDDATE, DATE_FORMAT(mord.UPD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') UPD_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(mord.INS_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') INS_DATE, insusr.USER_FULLNAME INS_USER, updusr.USER_FULLNAME UPD_USER FROM qr_morder mord JOIN qr_order ord ON mord.ORDER_ID = ord.order_id and ord.order_status=0 JOIN qr_project pro ON ord.PROJECT_ID = pro.PROJECT_ID and pro.pro_status=0 LEFT JOIN qr_user pmorderuser ON mord.MAINTAIN_PM = pmorderuser.USER_ID LEFT JOIN qr_dict_maintainstatus ms ON mord.maintain_status = ms.id LEFT JOIN qr_faulttype ft ON FAULT_TYPE = ft.FAULTTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN qr_user pmuser ON mord.MAINTAIN_PM = pmuser.USER_ID LEFT JOIN qr_dict_acceptstatus astust ON mord.ACCEPT_STATUS = astust.id
LEFT JOIN qr_user updusr ON mord.INS_USER = updusr.USER_ID LEFT JOIN qr_user insusr ON mord.INS_USER = insusr.USER_ID where mord.MORDER_STATUS = 0
AND ( #insUser# = mord.MAINTAIN_PM OR #insUser# = mord.MORDER_PM OR #insUser# = project.PM_ID OR EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM qr_rel_project_user qrpu WHERE qrpu.project_id = project.PROJECT_ID AND qrpu.user_id = #insUser# ) )
mord.MAINTAIN_STATUS=0
mord.MAINTAIN_STATUS=3
(MAINTAIN_STATUS=1 OR MAINTAIN_STATUS=2)
(mord.MORDER_NO LIKE '%$strLike$%' or pro.PROJECT_NO LIKE '%$strLike$%' or pmuser.USER_FULLNAME LIKE '%$strLike$%' )
mord.MORDER_NO LIKE '%$morderNo$%'
mord.ORDER_ID =#orderId#
ord.ORDER_NO LIKE '%$orderNo$%'
EXISTS ( SELECT item.deviceitem_uid FROM qr_deviceitem item WHERE item.order_id = ord.ORDER_ID AND item.deviceitem_uid LIKE '%$convergeBoxNo$%' )
sqlMap.insert:
insert into qr_morder(ORDER_ID, MORDER_NO, MORDER_PM, MAINTAIN_DATE, FAULT_DESC, APPOINTMENT_DATE, PLAN_END_DATE, MWORKER_CNT, MAINTAIN_BEGIN_DATE, MAINTAIN_STATUS, MAINTAIN_SPEED, FAULT_TYPE, MAINTAIN_PM, ACCEPT_STATUS, ACCEPTECALL_MAN, CALLBACK_DATE, SOLUTION, MAINTAIN_RESULTDESC, MAINTAIN_REMARK, USER_SCORE, USER_PROPOSAL, LAST_UPDDATE, UPD_DATE, INS_DATE, INS_USER, UPD_USER ) values( #orderId#, #morderNo#, #morderPmId#, if(#maintainDate#='' ,null,STR_TO_DATE(#maintainDate#,'%Y-%m-%d')), #faultDesc#, if(#appointmentDate#='' ,null,STR_TO_DATE(#appointmentDate#,'%Y-%m-%d')), if(#planEndDate#='' ,null,STR_TO_DATE(#planEndDate#,'%Y-%m-%d')), #mworkerCnt#, if(#maintainBeginDate#='' ,null,STR_TO_DATE(#maintainBeginDate#,'%Y-%m-%d')), #maintainStatus#, #maintainSpeed#, #faultType#, #maintainPmId#, #acceptStatus#, #acceptecallMan#, if(#callbackDate#='' ,null,STR_TO_DATE(#callbackDate#,'%Y-%m-%d')), #solution#, #maintainResultdesc#, #maintainRemark#, #userScore#, #userProposal#, sysdate(), sysdate(), sysdate(), #insUser#, #updUser# )
SELECT last_insert_id() as morderId ;
sqlMap.update:
update qr_morder set MORDER_STATUS=1,UPD_USER=#updUser#,UPD_DATE=sysdate() where MORDER_ID=#morderId#
UPD_DATE=STR_TO_DATE(#updDate#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

update qr_morder set LAST_UPDDATE=sysdate(), MORDER_PM=#morderPmId#, MAINTAIN_DATE=if(#maintainDate#='' ,null,STR_TO_DATE(#maintainDate#,'%Y-%m-%d')), FAULT_DESC=#faultDesc#, APPOINTMENT_DATE=if(#appointmentDate#='' ,null,STR_TO_DATE(#appointmentDate#,'%Y-%m-%d')), PLAN_END_DATE=if(#planEndDate#='' ,null,STR_TO_DATE(#planEndDate#,'%Y-%m-%d')), MWORKER_CNT=#mworkerCnt#, MAINTAIN_BEGIN_DATE=if(#maintainBeginDate#='' ,null,STR_TO_DATE(#maintainBeginDate#,'%Y-%m-%d')), MAINTAIN_STATUS=#maintainStatus#, MAINTAIN_SPEED=#maintainSpeed#, FAULT_TYPE=#faultType#, MAINTAIN_PM=#maintainPmId#, ACCEPT_STATUS=#acceptStatus#, ACCEPTECALL_MAN=#acceptecallMan#, CALLBACK_DATE=if(#callbackDate#='' ,null,STR_TO_DATE(#callbackDate#,'%Y-%m-%d')), SOLUTION=#solution#, MAINTAIN_RESULTDESC=#maintainResultdesc#, MAINTAIN_REMARK=#maintainRemark#, USER_SCORE=#userScore#, USER_PROPOSAL=#userProposal#, UPD_DATE=sysdate(), UPD_USER=#updUser# where MORDER_ID=#morderId# and UPD_DATE=STR_TO_DATE(#updDate#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
sqlMap.select: select ORDER_ID, MORDER_ID, MORDER_NO, MORDER_PM, DATE_FORMAT(MAINTAIN_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') MAINTAIN_DATE, FAULT_DESC, DATE_FORMAT(APPOINTMENT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') APPOINTMENT_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(PLAN_END_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') PLAN_END_DATE, MWORKER_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(MAINTAIN_BEGIN_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') MAINTAIN_BEGIN_DATE, MAINTAIN_STATUS, MAINTAIN_SPEED, FAULT_TYPE, MAINTAIN_PM, ACCEPT_STATUS, ACCEPTECALL_MAN, DATE_FORMAT(CALLBACK_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') CALLBACK_DATE, SOLUTION, MAINTAIN_RESULTDESC, MAINTAIN_REMARK, USER_SCORE, USER_PROPOSAL, DATE_FORMAT(last_UpdDate,'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') last_UpdDate, DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') UPD_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(INS_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') INS_DATE, INS_USER, UPD_USER from qr_morder where MORDER_ID=#morderId#
sqlMap.update: update qr_morder set UPD_DATE=sysdate(), LAST_UPDDATE=sysdate(), USER_SCORE=#userScore#, USER_PROPOSAL=#userProposal#, UPD_USER=#updUser# where MORDER_ID=#morderId# and UPD_DATE=STR_TO_DATE(#updDate#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

update qr_morder set UPD_DATE=sysdate(), LAST_UPDDATE=sysdate(), MAINTAIN_BEGIN_DATE=if(#maintainBeginDate#='' ,null,STR_TO_DATE(#maintainBeginDate#,'%Y-%m-%d')), UPD_USER=#updUser# where MORDER_ID=#morderId# and UPD_DATE=STR_TO_DATE(#updDate#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
update qr_morder set UPD_DATE=sysdate(), LAST_UPDDATE=sysdate(), MAINTAIN_SPEED=#maintainSpeed#, UPD_USER=#updUser# where MORDER_ID=#morderId# and UPD_DATE=STR_TO_DATE(#updDate#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
update qr_morder set UPD_DATE=sysdate(), LAST_UPDDATE=sysdate(), FAULT_TYPE=#faultType#, UPD_USER=#updUser# where MORDER_ID=#morderId# and UPD_DATE=STR_TO_DATE(#updDate#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

update qr_morder set UPD_DATE=sysdate(), LAST_UPDDATE=sysdate(), MAINTAIN_RESULTDESC=#maintainResultdesc#, UPD_USER=#updUser# where MORDER_ID=#morderId# and UPD_DATE=STR_TO_DATE(#updDate#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
update qr_morder set UPD_DATE=sysdate(), UPD_USER=#updUser# where MORDER_ID=#morderId# and UPD_DATE=STR_TO_DATE(#updDate#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
update qr_morder set UPD_DATE=sysdate(), MWORKER_CNT=#mworkerCnt#, UPD_USER=#updUser# where MORDER_ID=#morderId# and UPD_DATE=STR_TO_DATE(#updDate#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
